name: autohide the menu & sidebar [Xinhua News Agency]
description:
Hides the Xinhua header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)

Xinhuanet is a real museum piece. The page layout is almost entirely <kbd>TABLE</kbd>s and <kbd>IFRAME</kbd>s, with only a handful of IDs and class names.
additional_info:
The thin vertical bars at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header and sidebar. Mouse over them to restore the element.
  1. Move the lead photo below the article text
  2. On Zoom (ctrl+plus) the article becomes wider, but not wider than the display.
